thread.section_title: TAXIBOX mobile self-storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TAXIBOX mobile self-storage | www.taxibox.com.au | 2 of 12
thread.title: Claire
thread.title_full: TAXIBOX mobile self-storage reviewed by Claire

author: Claire
title: Claire
text: Extremely helpful, smart, switched-on staff on the end of the phone whenever I needed to speak to someone, and consistency dealing with the same people via phone & email - makes a huge difference at a stressful time when even the smallest organisational oversight can lead to major moving dramas. Everything stored was in perfect condition when I accessed it again. Flexible delivery & pick up options. Delivery drivers were equally friendly, competent and efficient. So delightful compared to some of the blockhead drivers I've dealt with when moving on other occasions. Cannot recommend highly enough.
